data.title: Reliance Retail Q1 PAT: Reliance Retail Q1 Profit Soars 28.3% to Rs 3,271 Crore Amid Revenue Growth, ETRetail
data.description: Reliance Retail Q1 PAT: Reliance Retail reports a substantial increase in its profit after tax, growing 28.3% to Rs 3,271 crore in Q1 2025, alongside an 11.3% rise in gross revenue. The company continues to expand its customer base and store network, focusing on operational excellence and enhanced product offerings.

similar.title: Reliance Retail buys Kelvinator to boost its durables business
similar.description: Reliance Retail, led by Isha Ambani, has acquired American appliance manufacturer Kelvinator, aiming to expand its presence in the consumer durables market. This acquisition combines Reliance's extensive retail network with Kelvinator's established brand reputation and legacy of innovation. Reliance Retail intends to leverage Kelvinator's brand equity to enhance its offerings across various appliance categories, targeting growth and deeper consumer engagement.
